14211122.content:
As you softly sit back and stroke your stomach, trying to afford your partner what little comfort you can, a soft voice comes to you. "Sloppy, there is no other word to describe it." The figure that approuchs you first appears to be a human, however his wings quickly betray his true nature. From the descriptions you recognize him as a Lucemon, though you have never actually seen one in the past. While he is only of the Rookie level it is said that Mega digimon quiver in fear at even the weakest of his species. The boy presents an obvious danger, but you do your best to keep from offending him. As he grows closer the Lucemon continues. "It's obvious that you have not practiced nearly enough. You could not even save your poor little tamer." With a sardonic little smile the Lucemon gives your belly a few soft rubs. While it is meant in insult you cannot help but be relaxed by the motion. "Though perhaps you were fortunate. Afterall your truly free now, aren't you?" The loss of Davis is troubling, but the Lucemon's words do hit a chord within you. You had always said that Davis was your friend, not your master, but you still devoured him at the first real chance.

Finished with his rubbing Lucemon floats back a bit and smiles more genuinely. "You obviously lack control, but at the same time your swallowing technique was superb. You have the potential to be far more than a simple predator of circumstance." The offer seems quite intriguing, though your unsure precisly what he means. Fortunatly he seems to anticipate this as well.

"To the west of here is a small island. It was once much like this area, until the Scourge came. They were a heartless band of digimon whom invaded the island, devouring every living creature on it. In time a bounty was placed upon them, in hopes that warriors whom could slay them would emerge. Eventually digimon began using their own tactics against them. The Scourge were eaten one by one by an equally powerful team of mercinaries. This was the first "War of Consumption". Since that time Digimon whom wished to follow in their footsteps have traveled to that island. By eating the other residents they grow stronger, so that they may challange the island's ruler. If they eat him than they take his position. The ruler is effectivly a living god on the island, and must be served by the others. Though they are also always out to swallow him at the first opening. It is a position of infinite risk and reward."

It surprises you that this story has never come up in the past, but nevertheless you are intrigued. "So your saying you think I have a shot at it?" The Lucemon nods softly, looking you over. "I'd recommend reverting to your rookie form. With your tamer digested there is no telling when you will devolve. It would be better to do it now, rather then by thrown off balance by a shift in battle. Besides, it will hide your power better on the island. Most the residents stay Rookies." For the moment you remain Flaredramon, but you realize the wisdom of his advice. "It does sound kind of fun, but I don't think I'm strong enough yet." Your response raises a chuckle from Lucemon. "Of course not. I would however be willing to train you. But I must warn you that I am a harsh tutor. And if I begin to feel it is hopeless, I may decide to cut my loses and simply eat you instead." Noding softly you decide to let him go on without suggesting a decision one way or the other. "And furthermore..." There is a blur of white light and then utter darkness. All you can see is a pitchblack space, a tight flesh gripping your neck. It dawns on you that your head must be in Lucemon's throat, yet you did not even see him move! His tongue softly rubs against your neck before he widens his jaw to release you. "Don't even foster an idea of betraying me, or attempting to escape. If I want you to be food, then food you shall be." With Lucemon's breath still fresh in your nostrals you timidly nod; the stories are obviously true.

Slowly, trying not to drool too much, she stalked over to the father, creeping around to his head. Carefully, he lifted him up by the shoulders and lifted him towards her mouth, her jaws opening wide. She pressed his head up against her jaws and gently pushed them inside, flinching as her jaws popped loose to give her extra space to work with.

She quickly glanced at her meals, to see if they had woken up yet, and sighed in relief when they both just grunted, the mother turning over away from Renamon. Slowly, she pushed the father's head into her mouth and just barely managed to repress a groan as his strong, rich taste washed over her tongue. Not wanting to dawdle, though, as neither of her meals were tied up, she swallowed, quickly working the father's shoulders into her mouth. She moaned softly, gently caressing the sleeping man's arms, elicting a pleased giggle from the still-sleeping human.

"Mmm, Rumiko, that feels so good..." he moaned.

Renamon's ears perked. Rumiko was the name of Rika's mother! And he was having fantasies about her? Oh this is too rich. Something to torment her meal with once they were all inside her.

She kept on eating, her jaws, neck and chest distending greatly as she took swallow after swallow, leaning over and 'crawling' down his body as she injested him. Slowly, the father's form plainly visible in her abnormally stretched fur.

*GULP*

Renamon grunted softly as she swallowed Takato's father up to his waist. She was slightly amazed that he hadn't woken up yet, but wasn't about to complain. That just made it easier for her.

*GULP*

Her stomach expanded as she swallowed again, the strong, elder male's rump vanishing into her maw. She grunted softly, and moved slightly to the side in anticipation of her belly swelling out to the sides.

*GULP*

Another swallow took in his thighs, causing her belly to bulge out even more. And amazingly, he was STILL asleep!! Good grief.

*GULP*

In went his calves, out went her belly as he curled up inside of her with Guilmon's remains. Her stomach was starting to feel heavier, and the bedmat was starting to bunch up from her scooting forward. She reached up and pressed in on his wriggling, bare feet, and swallowed one last time, quickly sliding off of the bedmat as her belly surged outward, Takato's father curling up inside of her stomach, giggling and muttering dirty words to Rumiko Nonaka in his dreams, unknowngly hugging Guilmon's partially digested corpse.

Renamon chuckled softly at the wriggling in her belly, and surpressed a belch. She quickly glanced over at Takato's still sleeping mother, who now seemed uncomfortable. She knew she had little time left in which to take her, and prepared to make her move.
14321111211212.title: Down Goes Daddy

choices: Call Takato to help carry her belly downstairs...
Take a chance and rest a little...  (Meanwhile, in Takato's room...)
143211112112121.content:
Renamon groaned softly, keeping her eyes on Takato's mother even as her overbloated tummy gurgled in protest at how already stretched it was. The concept of adding ANOTHER full-sized adult human to it was quite frankly terrifying.

Which was too bad, because now that her appetite was unfettered, Renamon had no intentions of stopping.

Grunting, trying desperately not to wake the mother, she hefted her tremendously bloated belly upwards towards the mother's head, failing miserably at not making any noise.

Still, though, the mother slept on. Renamon frowned, confused...

...then she noticed the large, empty sake bottle.

Renamon chuckled, thanking the gods that watched over ravenous huntresses, and hefted up the drunk into unconciousness mother. She sniffed the mother's breath and nearly threw up.

"Good grief... How much sake did you drink today?" Renamon asked rhetorically. She shook her head and opened her jaws widely, stuffing the mother's head into her already pre-stretched jaws.

The mother went down easier than the father did, if only because she was smaller and eating the father first had stretched her jaws out. The vulpine digimon's mouth slid easily over the mother's slender frame, Renamon almost moaning out loud in delight at the mother's taste, deciding then and there that female humans tasted much better than males.

With a few quick swallows, the mother vanished between Renamon's lips and into her belly, which surged outward with its new occupant.

Which created a new problem.

Renamon, for the first time since she started this, was wondering if this was a good idea. Her belly, containing a large digimon and two full-sized adult humans, was now stretched out tremendously. Pain shot through her skin as the two asleep adults inside adjusted themselves to more comfort, causing Renamon tremendous, shooting pain in her titanic belly. She clutched her stomach and moaned, belching loudly and praying that she wouldn't burst, all thoughts of taunting her prey if they woke up gone.

She belched again, expelling more air from her stomach. She finally felt her meals start to settle down inside her, and the pain start to ease.

She whimpered softly, wishing she had thought this out more. What should she do next? Should she get Takato to help get her belly downstairs so she could eat him and be done with at least PART of her plan? Or should she chance losing her control over him, so she could take a rest and let her stomach settle? (She could easily re-hypnotize him, or come up with a cover story to explain her bloat and his parents and partner's disappearance, she was just worried that he had been AWARE during his time of being under her control...)

What to do, what to do...
143211112112121.title: Momma Meal

1432111121121211.content:
"Takato, you may come inside," called out Renamon, muffling another low belch and groaning at how her massive stomach ached. Through half-slitted eyes, the vulpine Digimon watched as Takato walked stiffly into the room, the young boy's eyes still hazy and blank as he stopped before her. Good, at least her hypnosis still held him. Now to have him help her downstairs and then...well, she'd have to see after that.
"Takato, I'm feeling...rather bloated. You'll have to help me get downstairs, however you can."
The young boy nodded silently, dully at the command and walked over to the side of the bed, Renamon grunting and hissing as she slid over to the edge, the human's arms slowly encircling the furthest edge of her huge stomach, Takato pushing up to the bloated orb and taking up at least part of its weight while Renamon shakily go to her paws, still putting some of her weight on the bed while she looked to the tamer. "Good, now let's get me downstairs."
Takato once more nodded his silent consent and began to walk backwards, the female Digimon gasping as she was forced to lean against him and quickly pad forward, her belly more a huge obstacle than a pain at the moment. It took a bit of getting used to as she stumbled quickly forward, but using whatever handhold she could find as they walked, she was able to manuever out of the room (barely), and get to the stairs, the boy leading her dumbly all the way.
Getting down the stairs was a good deal harder, but as most of her tremendous weight now rested upon Takato, who simply trudged down the stairs as if he weren't struggling to bear her weight, the two of them made it down the stairs and into the bakery's kitchen, Renamon letting out a massive sigh of relief as she slumped against a counter and soothed her belly with her paws.
Now that she was downstairs, there was only one more thing to do... Renamon looked over Takato, who attended her side as dutifully as any servant. He was smaller than any of her three previous meals, and he did <I>look</I> delicious...but could her stomach handle him? She bit over her lip as she tried to decide...

She moaned softly, slurping over his feet briefly and reaching up, forcing his feet into her throat and swallowing HARD, feeling him go down completely into her belly, a surge of pain shooting through her stomach.

Her gently rubbed her titanic stomach, belching every so often, the pressure inside her slowly decreasing, the pain slowly subsiding as her belly churned, gurgling angrily at how overstuffed it was.

Finally, she felt comfortable enough to sleep, her eyes closing gently as her hands unconciously rubbed her bloated gut, trying to sooth it as it digested its titanic meal. She slept on quietly, loudly belching occasionally, too exhausted to notice the slender, female figure coming in to join her...
14321111211212111.title: No More Matsukis

143211112112121111.content:
Rika, after picking the lock on the front door, quickly shut and re-locked the door behind her as she went in. Quickly pulling a sheet of paper and pencil out, she wrote 'On Vacation, Back In Two Weeks,' on it, looked for and found some tape, and taped it too the door.

Only then, once all that was completed, did she go over to her immensely bloated and utterly exhausted partner, resting her head on Renamon's agonizingly stuffed stomach and listening to the sounds of her stomach desperately trying to process her massive meal.

"Oh, poor Renamon... All bloated and full," she said, after a few minutes of listening to her partner digest, "Let me help you get better..."

She stood back and pulled out three cards, all bearing draws she had made herself.

One was of a very fat Renamon looking content with dozens of empty plates around her.

"Digi Modify. Faultess Digestion for Tamer and Partner activate."

Renamon and Rika both glowed briefly, and Rika chuckled, picking out another card, this one bearing an image of Renamon swallowing a very large building whole.

"Elastic Body, activate."

Renamon glowed again, and Rika pulled out a final card, one bearing an image of Renamon stuffing herself on an endless buffet table.

"Eternal appetite, activate."

Renamon glowed once more. Soon, her belly began churning more loudly as it quickened its digestive pace.

Rika chuckled softly, and licked her lips. "Thank you Kazu for showing me how to make made-up cards work. Now for the rest of my plan. If I'm to be a big fat dessert treat for Renamon after she eats everyone else, I better get started..." she said, sauntering over to a tray of sweet rolls and starting to eat.

=============
Morning
=============

Renamon groaned softly as she came awake, licking her lips happily. The pain in her belly had subsided completely, and she felt stronger than before.

Her eyes fluttered open, and she meeped at how big her belly still was. She chuckled, feeling the vast, flabby dome and pressing her paws in it, marvelling at how deep they were able to compress her fat belly.

-Hmm... Empty then,- Renamon thought, chuckling and licking her lips. -Guess I'll just have to keep filling it.-

She stood up heavily, and looked herself over. Her belly had taken the most of her fat growth, but she had filled out all over, gaining thicker legs, a chubby face, a wide ass, and a medium-sized, soft pair of breasts. She felt herself up for a moment and looked around.

When she noticed Rika, she stared.

The young girl had grown tremendously fat from stuffing herself on the contents of the bakery. She had put on at least a hundred pounds from eating so much bread, her butt, hips, and legs swelling out to the point of straining her jeans. She now had a pronounced potbelly, c-cup breasts that strained against her top, a cute, chubby face, and flabby arms.

She was finishing off the last bit of bread in the store when she turned to Renamon and smiled at her.

"Hiya, sleepyhead. Did you get a nice nap?"

Renamon nodded. "Rika, is there anything wrong?"

Rika shook her head. "Nah. It just occured to me that you may need help now and then. And besides, I've got a special treat for you once you eat all the other Tamers, their partners, and their families."

Renamon folded her arms, somewhat amused. "Oh really? What?"

Rika spread her arms out and smiled. "Me! I've already modified you to take in big meals, and want to be big and fat for your last Tamer meal. But I want to be eaten in the Digital World when it's time for me to be munch."

Renamon quirked her head to one side curiously. "Really? Why?

Rika grinned. "It's a surprise. Now where do you want to go next? Henry's is closest and has got a LOT for you to munch, but Jeri's house is far out of town and would be a good 'headquarters' for the two of us."

Renamon smiled at her Tamer, loving her all the more for being willing to make such a sacrifice to her. She thought carefully for a few minutes, trying to decided where to go next...
